accounts.name: platform_wallet
docs: This is the platform wallet specified in GlobalConfig.
Its address is validated via the `address = global_config.platform_wallet` constraint.
No other runtime checks are necessary.

accounts.name: burn
docs: This is a burn sink account (e.g., SystemProgram::id() or a known dead address).
It only receives lamports; no data is read or written.

errors.name: SlippageTooHigh
errors.msg: Slippage too high or zero output

errors.name: InvalidReceipt
errors.msg: Poll in the receipt doesn't match
